nodes.text: Zorin Krasul was a Cathar male senator who represented the planet Anaxes in the Galactic Senate of the Republic during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, the new commander of Havoc Squad was called to a Senate hearing to discuss the defection of the previous one, at which Krasul was one of the overseers. Afterwards, Krasul was captured by Wraith, a former soldier from Havoc Squad who joined the resurgent Sith Empire. He was taken to Port Raga and was forced to confess to the Senate about abandoning Havoc Squad on Ando Prime. When the new Havoc Squad arrived to rescue him, Wraith escaped, leaving the Senator on a bomb chair that would go off if he attempted to move. Havoc Squad was able to defuse the bomb and Krasul escorted back to Coruscant under the watch of Sergeant Ava Jaxo. Krasul's wife later sent a message to Havoc Squad, telling them that they've earned an ally in the Senate.

Sometime after the outbreak of the Galactic War, Havoc Squad was called for another Senate hearing to discuss their activities. The Senator behind the hearing, Grom Zian, labeled the squad a threat to the Republic, claiming that they abuse their position. In turn, the Havoc CO present evidence gathered by the SIS revealing Zian to be a paid agent for the Empire. Though Zian tried to deny the evidence, claiming these to be "wild accusations" and "paranoid delusions". Krasul stood up for the CO, stating that his rescuer deserved more than to be dismissed out of hand. The Senate committee then reviewed the evidence before ordering the Senate Guard to detain Zian for high treason.

According to the game's conversation files, Krasul's kidnapping was originally planned to occur after the Nar Shaddaa storyline, and would have taken place on in the Red Light Sector of Nar Shaddaa rather than than Port Raga.
